#summary Help to Configure the !WebPart

= Introduction =

This guide helps to configure the !WebPart on the !SharePoint 2010 portal


= Configuration =

  # Add the !WebPart from the !webpart gallery to the desired page, found under the _italic_"Sumit"_italic_ category
  <br/>
  https://sharepoint-google-maps-webpart.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/WebpartGallery.jpg<br/>
  # As soon as the !webpart is added default location will be shown
  # To configure the location edit the webpart <br/>https://sharepoint-google-maps-webpart.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/GMShowEdit.jpg<br/>  
  # Now you will find that the marker in the map is a draggable one.<br/>https://sharepoint-google-maps-webpart.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/EditWebPart.jpg<br/>  
  # Drag the marker to the desired location
  # Enter the Title of the location in the textbox corresponding to the _italic_Title_italic label
  # In the Address textbox Closest Matching Address will be shown, if need to change , enter the desired address to be shown in the textbox and than blank click on the site(it is important to make a blank click)
  # Now save the page and the Map will show the location you desired along with the Address and Title of the location
  <br/>https://sharepoint-google-maps-webpart.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/Map.jpg<br/>
